Dymynator.description: It's the Dymynator. The Lord of Hamsters. The Ruler of Math (except stochastic). It is a Hamster? No! Is it a Boy? No! It's the Dymynator!

Avus-Avis.description: He is the grandfather of all birds. His wings are longer than any promotional tour could reach.

Champagnier.description: It is a little gourmét, which loves good food and particuarly wine. Also it wears always a bottle and is often drunk.

Lizzle.description: Great. Brilliant. Terrfic. Bullet-Proof and Super-Natural Fish. But extraordinarily stupid.

Aestas.description: It is a small dinosaur with yellow feathers, like a sunflower in the summer. He looks very cute, because he has a big beak and a small body, but if he hungry, he will be dangerous.

Ferreon.description: Ferreon is a little raccon. He is the ninja of the nature and the hero of the big city jungle..

Cricetinae.description: It's a hamster! It's cute, abdorable and snappy.

Jussi.description: Jussi is a clever, white and angry beaver.

Catoline.description: A green-black-striped big cat, which has long, dangerous claws and green eyes.

Hugolo.description: Hugulo. It is a pink, fluffy rabbit. But he has red eyes, which can kill you.

Souri.description: Souri is a little mouse with yellow tail and paws and a white fur.

Eirik.description: He is nice and tolerant, but he hasn't any friends except Phnax.

Phnax.description: An anemone clown fish with jug ears.

Combus.description: A colour-blind lizard wich can change his body colour randomly. He usually doesn't know what colour his body has.

Emmil.description: A white horse with shiny blue eyes. She likes music. Her best friends are Combus and Skopper.

Ladas.description: Ladas is a cute red bumblebee. She is a really huge bumblebee, so don't underestimate her.

Laudiphant.description: A fluffy purple elephant wich loves sweets, especially pancakes. You better do not stand between a Laudiphant and a pancake... It's for your own sake.

Oedipus.description: Oedipus is a blue fire bird with a big red tail and two green eyes.

Lop.description: Lop is a really big black lop, he isnt cute...

Birwon.description: Birwon is a little cute Monkey with green eyes.

Mydusa.description: Medusa's sister. She can do everything - except latin.

Skopper.description: Skopper is the labrador of all the creatures: He barks, protects his friends and smells like a dog...well, he is a dog. By the way, his fur is neongreen.

Pieuvrerre.description: An orange octupus. One of Phnax' friends

Escargon.description: A yellow-violet-checkered snail. Escargon's worst fear is being eaten.

Nouillon.description: A kind of noodle monster. Look delicious. Please do not eat him.

Forget-me-not.description: A beautiful blue flower with yellow eyes. Forget-me-not gets scared easily! She is a real scaredy cat.

Buffalon.description: Buffalon is a shiny red buffalo with a big black moustache.

Papilio.description: Papilio is a special butterfly. Because he is able to swim and he loves the sea. Papilio isn't a small insect, he is as huge as a Ladas.

Sandmin.description: He is the twin brother of the Sandman. He wears a black suit and a green hat. His hair is lightblue and long.

Joeey.description: Joeey is a snowman wich can't melt. He enjoys the summer and loves ice cream.

Karlson.description: Karlson is a brown moose with a blond spot.
